channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 19:40 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts
item.description: 🟠 19:40 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 19:31 Driven the alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.
